title: It all changes today.
description: Been a long time coming. Today it's here:    I am partnering with @NetworkChuck to create thisisIT, a collaborative effort to create FREE IT training content on YouTube. We will be working together to create FULL IT training courses on YouTube.   If  you'd like to partner with us on this mission, consider joining the thisisIT membership:   #thisisIT  #davidbombal #networkchuck
transcript: (keyboard clacks) - Now it's taken me a long time to get to this point. I've been doing a bunch of things in the background, but hopefully what I'm gonna tell you about today is gonna be good news. I'm gonna be offering you three paths, or three ways to get certified. (upbeat music) Now It's really amazing how quickly time flies by. I recorded that video over three months ago. Time just flies. You need to make the most of your time. But there are some reasons that I didn't publish that video, including this. - I legit quit my job. Yeah, I quit my job and it's not like a part time job or some silly job I have on the side. No, I quit my main, full time, primary source of income.
